commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Is this...the rooftop? Have we made it to the goal?

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: We're f-finally here. That was terrifying!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I... *Huff* *Puff* Can't...run...anymore.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: *Wheeze* Me neither.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Riko, are you all right?

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: I don't even know anymore. Ahaha.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Rinako! What was the deal with that last thing?!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I used dry ice to fill the hallway with mist, which then acted as a screen for me to project a video onto.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: *Whimper* I knew it was all fake, but it still scared me into a bubbling mess.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: You have all helped me gather some valuable data. Thank you.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: While I am absolutely exhausted, I am glad to have been of assistance to you.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Yup! I probably need to make some further adjustments to reach the level I'm striving for. I hope you'll help me out again when I upgrade it.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: N-N-Nope! Never, ever, ever!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: If it was just a slightly scary haunted house, then I could act frightened in a cute way, but this is way beyond that threshold!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Was it really that scary?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: It was so scary that I forgot to act cute! That just shows how terrifying it was!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: You might've been even more scared than me.

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: That might be because she's here almost daily but doesn't get exposed to anything that scary. Maybe the fright levels were different for Kasumi than for us.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: You might have a point there.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I see... I'm sorry, Kasumi. Rina-chan Board says, "Slump."

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: It's okay. She might say otherwise, but Kasumi always puts her friends' needs first. I am sure she will make herself available next time as well.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: And perhaps you should invite Honoka along instead of me next time. You will be able to gain even better data that way.

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: U-Umi...

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: For my own reference, what part did you all find the scariest?

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: It was all pretty scary, but if I had to choose one part as the scariest, it would have to be what you did with the auditorium.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Yes. That went above and beyond.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: All the blood drained from my face when I saw those dripping, disheveled people crawling towards me.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: LAA LAA LAA! I can't hear you!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: I've never run so fast before in my life.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: The rueful grimaces on their faces looked so real and so graphic. Just thinking back on it now makes me want to shudder all over.

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Yeah. That was way too scary, so you should probably remove it from the attraction.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Huh?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I didn't set anything like that up in the auditorium. What are you talking about?

commands.speaker: Umi, Ruby, Kotori, Riko, Kasumi
commands.line: Wait... What?
